medical
  specialized A hyperacute illness or condition is extremely and unusually severe: hyperacute conjunctivitis A sudden outbreak caused the deaths of 9 horses due to a hyperacute respiratory disease.hyperacute rejection When animal organs are transplanted into people there is a violent, hyperacute rejection.
A hyperacute sense or feeling is extremely and unusually strong: This type of fly depends on its hyperacute directional hearing for its survival. Some people develop a hyper-acute sense of smell that drives them to distraction.
